Description:
As organizations rapidly build AI and innovation accelerates, so do the risks. Deep dive to learn how to safeguard AI agents across their lifecycle by managing identity, data access, posture, and applying governance at scale.

BRK268 | English (US) Breakout | Advanced (300) #MSIgnite, #ProtectcloudAIplatformandapps

Chapters: 0:00 - Introduction and team introductions for Microsoft Foundry Agents with Security session 00:01:23 - Mapping AI threat landscape using MITRE, OWASP, and Atlas frameworks 00:02:35 - AI usage layer and extended risks including insider risk and overreliance on AI 00:13:56 - Demonstration intent: different responses for executives vs. entry-level employees based on data labels 00:17:00 - Explanation of six agent runtime intervention points for improved security 00:24:29 - Microsoft Intra Agent ID in Public Preview and Its Expanded Management Capabilities 00:27:25 - Demo: Agent ID Interface and Conditional Access Policy Setup 00:32:20 - Overview of AI Application Components and Security Points 00:33:04 - Demonstration of Defender AI Agents Tab and Recommendations
Author: Microsoft Events
Title: Secure agents in Microsoft Foundry with Microsoft Security | BRK268
